body:
So what's happening here is that the first element of this list is being parsed out to determine whether we're parsing an assignment or not: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/parser.h#L264


...and with that I've found a bug in handling assignments where the first item is a starred

...and with that I've found a bug in handling assignments where the first item is a starred
body_text:
So what's happening here is that the first element of this list is being parsed out to determine whether we're parsing an assignment or not: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/jit/script/parser.h#L264
...and with that I've found a bug in handling assignments where the first item is a starred
